text: "Lonely Boy" is a 1977 song by Andrew Gold. It was taken from his second studio album What's Wrong with This Picture?. It went to number 7 in both the United States and Canada, number 40 in New Zealand, number 11 in the United Kingdom and number 32 in Australia. It was his biggest hit in the United States. ==References== Category:1977 songs Category:Andrew Gold songs Category:Foo Fighters songs Category:Soft rock songs
title: Lonely Boy (Andrew Gold song)
